metadata.title: CVE-2020-35479 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description: MediaWiki before 1.35.1 allows XSS via BlockLogFormatter.php. Language::translateBlockExpiry itself does not escape in all code paths. For example, the return of Language::userTimeAndDate is is always unsafe for HTML in a month value. This affects MediaWiki 1.12.0 and later.

criterions.comment: mediawiki package in impish is affected and may need fixing.
